txt.en: You have discovered three clusters of Fungus in the Second Hall of Nud-melek. Alas for the spread of a scourge in Moria; not even the fair stone trees are safe now.\n\nYou wonder what has woken the spores and stirred them to creep upward even to these dry halls....
An Unwholesome Odour
The fungus exudes a pungent, foul odour
'I would very much like to know where that putrid smell is coming from.'
The smell is overpowering here
The smell is less strong

The odour seems to be wafting from the southern area of the great tree-lined courtyard in Nud-melek.\n\nSvanr wants you to investigate the odour that occasionally sneaks up to disturb his silent homage.
The fungus exudes a pungent, foul odour
The odour wafts from the courtyard's southern edge in Nud-melek.\n\nYou should examine the second source of the odour.
The smell is overpowering here
The odour wafts from the courtyard's southern edge in Nud-melek.\n\nYou should examine the third source of the odour.
The smell is less strong

Svanr has detected an odd smell during his meditation upon the Stone Trees of the Second Hall.
The fungus exudes a pungent, foul odour
The smell is overpowering here
The smell is less strong

'I have travelled here to look upon the magnificent stone trees, but I find my meditation disturbed by hints of a strange odour. It is fleeting, but its source must be powerful in such a draughty, wide, high-ceilinged hall.\n\n'Will you find the source of the odour? I would hate to see even this stone forest tainted by the evils that have crept into Moria.'
